item.description: go to the start of document
go to the end of document
Persistent search (dialog doesn't autoclose, enter to find next, Shift-Enter to find previous)
Select line - Repeat to select next lines
Select word - Repeat select others occurrences
Delete from cursor to end of line
Delete from cursor to start of line
Join line below to the end of the current line
Redo, or repeat last keyboard shortcut command
soft undo; jumps to your last change before undoing change when repeated
Hard wrap line to ruler column setting
jump by start of words (punctuation considered words)
Go To command (prefix with number - 5G goes to line 5)﻿
insert at the beginning of the line
append at the end of the line
open (append) blank line below current line (no need to press return)
open blank line above current line
join line below to the current one
start visual mode, mark lines, then do command (such as y-yank)
replace all old with new throughout file
